# init(frame:zIndex:)

**Initializer**

Creates a custom item with the specified frame and vertical stacking order in relation to other items in the group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(frame: CGRect, zIndex: Int)
```

## Creating a custom item

- **init(frame:)**: Creates a custom item with the specified frame.

items.description: Creates a custom item with the specified frame.
items.name: init(frame:)
